text: Ndipo pamene zizindikiro ziwafikira iwo amati: “Ife sitidzakhulupirira mu ichi pokhapokha ngati tipatsidwa chimene Atumwi a Mulungu adapatsidwa.” Mulungu amadziwa bwino ndani amene akhoza kumupatsa uthenga wake. Kunyozedwa ndi kuchititsidwa manyazi kochokera kwa Mulungu ndiponso chilango chowawa chidzadza pa anthu oipa chifukwa cha zimene anali kuchita
